attributes.action: strengthen rule all citizens accept the rule of law including political leaders
attributes.additional_details: hansard provides information on the debates on no deal brexit and the votes against, and the bill passed to ensure a deal is secured or an extension requested from the EU. Boris Johnson's statement made front page headlines in several newsapers.
attributes.background: Parliament  has rejected a no deal brexit and has passed a law to ensure a deal is secured or an extension of the deadline requested. Boris Johnson has said he would rather die in a ditch than request an extension. It is now vital that all politicians and citizens accept the rule of law

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
